class.name: RrefGaussJordanRowPivot

javadoc.text: Reduction to RREF using Gauss-Jordan elimination with row (partial) pivots.
javadoc.author: Peter Abeles

method.name: reduce
method.comment: number of leading ones which have been found
select the row to pivot by finding the row with the largest column in 'i'

and using a technique which does the minimal number of swaps
zero column 'i' in all but the pivot row
